Hey guys im an old veteran of Quest (was a member when they had the old version of the forums lol) and I've decided to come back to the forums and become more involved =)

Might even do some coding and stuff too... so who is still here and what has changed?

Posts.EditableText:
Hiya Carlii...

Yeah - I remember ya! The odd thing is that I was looking at the member list and saw your name and thought "I wonder what Carlii's doing now?"... Kinda freaky eh!?

Welcome back mate - hope you are getting along well...
